history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER VA Hospital
TTS Okay, going to va pittsburgh healthcare system. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER University of Pittsburgh
TTS Okay, leaving from university of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER right now
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:13 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 9 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 10 mins to Bryn Mawr Rd at Centre avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER Annie repeat that
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER repeat
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER I'm done.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 83 to VA Hospital Transit Loop at Shelter. It is scheduled to depart at 2:24pm, however it is currently 11 MINUTES away. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER repeat
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 83 to VA Hospital Transit Loop at Shelter. It is scheduled to depart at 2:24pm, however it is currently 11 MINUTES away. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
